description.en: Top-right panel of the Quad layout. The Swedish infantry charges with bayonets fixed, faces grim with determination. Russian soldiers recoil under the assault, their line buckling amid torn banners and drifting smoke. The clash of steel fills the air.

narration.en: The tide turns — momentum now in Swedish hands.

info: Page 10 – Swedish Push Forward. PageType: 4). Scene (panel 2): Swedish infantry closes in, breaking Russian front under fierce assault.
